TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Label extends System.Windows.Forms.Control implements class System.Windows.Forms.Automation.IAutomationLiveRegion
Public Class Label Inherits Control Implements IAutomationLiveRegion
type Label = class inherit Control interface IAutomationLiveRegion

summary.span: 表示标准 Windows 标签。

span.span: Represents a standard Windows label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件通常用于为控件提供说明性文本。 controls are typically used to provide descriptive text for a control. 例如，可以使用添加说明性文本控件向用户通知有关的数据控件中的预期类型。For example, you can use a to add descriptive text for a control to inform the user about the type of data expected in the control. 此外可以使用控件添加到的说明性文本用户提供有用的信息。 controls can also be used to add descriptive text to a to provide the user with helpful information. 例如，您可以添加的顶部，说明如何输入窗体上控件中的数据上的用户。For example, you can add a to the top of a that provides instructions to the user on how to input data in the controls on the form. 控件可以还用于显示运行时间的状态信息的应用程序。 controls can be also used to display run time information on the status of an application. 例如，您可以添加控件向窗体以显示每个文件的状态为已处理的文件的列表。For example, you can add a control to a form to display the status of each file as a list of files is processed. 一个参与 tab 键顺序的窗体，但不会接收的焦点 （tab 键顺序中的下一个控件接收焦点）。A participates in the tab order of a form, but does not receive focus (the next control in the tab order receives focus). 例如，如果属性设置为`true`，和助记键字符，与号后面的第一个字符 (&) — 中指定控件，当用户按下 ALT + 助记键属性，焦点会转移到tab 键顺序中的下一个控件。For example, if the property is set to `true`, and a mnemonic character—the first character after an ampersand (&)—is specified in the property of the control, when a user presses ALT+ the mnemonic key, focus moves to the next control in the tab order. 此功能提供了一个窗体的键盘导航。This feature provides keyboard navigation for a form. 除了显示的文本，以外控件还可以显示映像使用属性或多种和属性。In addition to displaying text, the control can also display an image using the property, or a combination of the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 一个可以通过透明设置其属性设置为`Color.Transparent`。A can be made transparent by setting its property to `Color.Transparent`. 当你使用透明的标签时，使用仅当前设备坐标系统在容器上绘制或背景可能无法正确绘制。When you use a transparent label, use only the current device coordinate system to draw on the container, or the background might paint improperly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建具有三维边框并包含一个图像控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that has a three-dimensional border and contains an image. 使用显示的图像和属性。The image is displayed using the and properties. 使用指定的助记键字符，该控件还具有标题。The control also has a caption with a mnemonic character specified. 该示例代码使用并属性，以正确的大小控件。The example code uses the and properties to properly size the control. 此示例需要已创建并命名为 imageList1 和它所加载两个映像。This example requires that an has been created and named imageList1 and that it has loaded two images. 该示例还需要的代码是在窗体具有命名空间添加到其代码。The example also requires that the code is within a form that has the namespace added to its code. [!code-cpp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，标签将显示使用其属性设置为`false`且其属性设置为`BorderStyle.None`。By default, a label is displayed with its property set to `false` and with its property set to `BorderStyle.None`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件具有三维边框和显示使用的图像和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that has a three-dimensional border and an image displayed using the and properties. 使用指定的助记键字符，该控件还具有标题。The control also has a caption with a mnemonic character specified. 示例代码使用并属性，以正确的大小窗体上控制在其上显示。The example code uses the and properties to properly size the control on the form on which it is displayed. 此示例需要已创建并命名为 imageList1 和它所加载两个映像。This example requires that an has been created and named imageList1 and that it has loaded two images. 该示例还需要的代码是在窗体具有命名空间添加到其代码。The example also requires that the code is within a form that has the namespace added to its code. [!code-cpp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否要在 的右边缘显示省略号 (...) 以表示 文本超出 的指定长度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ellipsis character (...) appears at the right edge of the , denoting that the text extends beyond the specified length of the .

value.span: 如果要通过省略号指示附加标签文本，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the additional label text is to be indicated by an ellipsis; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置到`true`显示文本的宽度超出了时在用户将通过使用鼠标控件。Set to `true` to display text that extends beyond the width of the when the user passes over the control with the mouse. 如果是`true`，标签将放大以适合文本，并且将不会显示一个省略号。If is `true`, the label will grow to fit the text and an ellipsis will not appear. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果字体为高于的高度和是`true`，则必须设置到`false`有关要绘制文本。If the font is taller than the height of the and is `true`, you must set to `false` for text to be drawn.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否自动调整控件的大小以显示其完整内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.

value.span: 如果控件调整宽度以完整显示内容，值为 ；反之，值为 。

span.span: if the control adjusts its width to closely fit its contents; otherwise, .

para.span: 使用设计器添加到窗体时，默认值为 。

span.span: When added to a form using the designer, the default value is .

para.span: 当从代码实例化时，默认值为 。

span.span: When instantiated from code, the default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`true`，则调整宽度以完整显示其内容。When this property is set to `true`, the adjusts its width to display its entire contents. 此属性通常设置为`true`当你使用控件来显示各种长度的文本，例如应用程序进程的状态。This property is typically set to `true` when you use a control to display various lengths of text, such as the status of an application process. 应用程序将不同语言中显示文本和文本的大小可能会增加或减少根据 Windows 中的语言设置时，还可以使用此属性。You can also use this property when the application will display text in various languages, and the size of the text might increase or decrease based on the language settings in Windows. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果字体为高于的高度和是`true`，则必须设置到`false`有关要绘制文本。If the font is taller than the height of the and is `true`, you must set to `false` for text to be drawn. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性。The following code example demonstrates the property. 若要运行此示例中，粘贴以下代码中，窗体并调用`InitializeLabel`方法从窗体的构造函数或`Load`方法。To run this example, paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializeLabel` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.LabelAutoSize#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LabelAutoSize/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LabelAutoSize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LabelAutoSize/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LabelAutoSize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LabelAutoSize/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为 Label1。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named Label1. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性添加到控件的边框。You can use this property to add a border to the control. 此属性通常用于区分标签中的另一个控件的应用程序中显示进程的状态。This property is typically used to differentiate a that labels another control from a that displays the status of a process in an application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件具有三维边框和显示使用的图像和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that has a three-dimensional border and an image displayed using the and properties. 使用指定的助记键字符，该控件还具有标题。The control also has a caption with a mnemonic character specified. 示例代码使用并属性，以正确的大小窗体上控制在其上显示。The example code uses the and properties to properly size the control on the form on which it is displayed. 此示例需要已创建并命名为 imageList1 和它所加载两个映像。This example requires that an has been created and named imageList1 and that it has loaded two images. 该示例还需要的代码是在窗体具有命名空间添加到其代码。The example also requires that the code is within a form that has the namespace added to its code. [!code-cpp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置标签控件的平面样式外观。

span.span: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the label control.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`FlatStyle.System`，分配给任何值， ， ，并属性将被忽略。When the property is set to `FlatStyle.System`, any values assigned to the , , , and properties are ignored. 此外，属性将忽略任何不是垂直属性设置的属性值。In addition, the property ignores any property values that are not vertical property settings. 水平对齐设置属性与该控件顶部对齐。Horizontally aligned settings of the property are aligned to the top of the control. 例如，如果您设置属性设置为`ContentAlignment.TopCenter`， `ContentAlignment.MiddleCenter`，或`ContentAlignment.BottomCenter`，当属性设置为`FlatStyle.System`中的文本控件，将对齐到顶部和中心位置中的控件边界。For example, if you set the property to `ContentAlignment.TopCenter`, `ContentAlignment.MiddleCenter`, or `ContentAlignment.BottomCenter`, when the property is set to `FlatStyle.System`, the text in the control will be aligned to the top and center locations within the bounds of the control. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 版本 1.1 中，设置属性设置为`FlatStyle.System`不会导致值属性被忽略。In the .NET Framework version 1.1, setting the property to `FlatStyle.System` does not cause the value of the property to be ignored. 此外，该属性不起在派生类中， 。In addition, the property has no effect in the derived class, .

exception.span: 分配的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The value assigned is not one of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以用于对齐的边界内的图像控制以确保正确地显示该图像。This property enables you to align an image within the boundaries of the control to ensure that the image is properly displayed. 您可以添加到映像使用属性或和属性。You can add an image to a using the property or the and properties. 不能拉伸或收缩以填充控件，如果控件是大于或小于该图像在控件中显示的图像。Images displayed in the control cannot be stretched or shrunk to fill the control if the control is larger or smaller than the image. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件具有三维边框和显示使用的图像和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that has a three-dimensional border and an image displayed using the and properties. 使用指定的助记键字符，该控件还具有标题。The control also has a caption with a mnemonic character specified. 示例代码使用并属性，以正确的大小窗体上控制在其上显示。The example code uses the and properties to properly size the control on the form on which it is displayed. 此示例需要已创建并命名为 imageList1 和它所加载两个映像。This example requires that an has been created and named imageList1 and that it has loaded two images. 该示例还需要的代码是在窗体具有命名空间添加到其代码。The example also requires that the code is within a form that has the namespace added to its code. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取控件的首选高度。

span.span: Gets the preferred height of the control.

value.span: 控件的高度（以像素为单位），假定显示单行文本。

span.span: The height of the control (in pixels), assuming a single line of text is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回该控件应这样才能正确显示文本，根据分配给控件的字体的高度。This property returns the height that the control should be in order to properly display text, based on the font assigned to the control. 可以使用此属性与属性来确保中的文本能够正确显示控件。You can use this property along with the property to ensure that the text in the control is displayed properly. 可以使用属性自动调整高度和宽度基于文本和字体大小的控件。You can use the property to automatically adjust the height and the width of the control, based on the text and font size. > [!NOTE] > 如果的属性控件设置为`BorderStyle.None`，返回的值属性将为更大边框所致。If the property of the control is set to `BorderStyle.None`, the value returned by property will be larger due to the lack of borders. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件具有三维边框和显示使用的图像和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that has a three-dimensional border and an image displayed using the and properties. 使用指定的助记键字符，该控件还具有标题。The control also has a caption with a mnemonic character specified. 示例代码使用并属性，以正确的大小窗体上控制在其上显示。The example code uses the and properties to properly size the control on the form on which it is displayed. 此示例需要已创建并命名为 imageList1 和它所加载两个映像。This example requires that an has been created and named imageList1 and that it has loaded two images. 该示例还需要的代码是在窗体具有命名空间添加到其代码。The example also requires that the code is within a form that has the namespace added to its code. [!code-cpp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property PreferredWidth As Integer
public: virtual property int PreferredWidth { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取控件的首选宽度。

span.span: Gets the preferred width of the control.

value.span: 控件的宽度（以像素为单位），假定显示单行文本。

span.span: The width of the control (in pixels), assuming a single line of text is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回文本字符串的长度，但不是会考虑使自动换行。This property returns the length of the text string, but does not take line wrapping into consideration. 例如，宽度为 300 像素宽的文本字符串可能显示为三行中这只是 100 像素宽。For example, a text string that measures 300 pixels wide could be displayed as three lines in a that is only 100 pixels wide. 属性仍然返回 300 像素。The property still returns 300 pixels. 您可以使用此属性连同属性，以确保中的文本能够正确显示控件。You can use this property, along with the property, to ensure that the text in the control is displayed properly. 可以使用属性自动调整高度和宽度控件基于文本和字体大小。You can use the property to automatically adjust the height and the width of the control based on the text and font size. > [!NOTE] > 如果的属性控件设置为`BorderStyle.None`，返回的值属性将为更大边框所致。If the property of the control is set to `BorderStyle.None`, the value returned by property will be larger due to the lack of borders. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件具有三维边框和显示使用的图像和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that has a three-dimensional border and an image displayed using the and properties. 使用指定的助记键字符，该控件还具有标题。The control also has a caption with a mnemonic character specified. 示例代码使用并属性，以正确的大小窗体上控制在其上显示。The example code uses the and properties to properly size the control on the form on which it is displayed. 此示例需要已创建并命名为 imageList1 和它所加载两个映像。This example requires that an has been created and named imageList1 and that it has loaded two images. 该示例还需要的代码是在窗体具有命名空间添加到其代码。The example also requires that the code is within a form that has the namespace added to its code. [!code-cpp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置标签中文本的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of text in the label.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性中以匹配你的窗体上的控件布局的标签文本对齐。You can use this property to align the text within a label to match the layout of controls on your form. 例如，如果在控件的标签的右侧，则可以设置属性设置为一个右对齐的水平对齐方式 (， ， ) 和文本将使用的右边缘对齐要与您的控件保持一致的标签。For example, if your controls are located to the right edge of the labels, you can set the property to one of the right-aligned horizontal alignments (, , ) and the text will be aligned with the right edge of the labels to align with your controls.

exception.span: 分配的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The value assigned is not one of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为 Label1。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named Label1. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#459](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#459)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#459](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#459)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseCompatibleTextRendering { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseCompatibleTextRendering : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是使用 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 还是 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 呈现文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.

value.span: 如果类应该用于执行文本呈现，以便与 1.0 和 1.1 版中的兼容性。

span.span: if the class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
of the .NET Framework; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性用于提供 visual 兼容性 Windows 窗体控件之间呈现文本使用类和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]的应用程序执行自定义文本呈现使用类。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大多数情况下，如果不从升级您的应用程序[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，则建议您保留`UseCompatibleTextRendering`设置的默认值为`false`。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基于类中引入了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]为了提高性能，使文本看起来不错，并提高对国际字体支持。The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在早期版本的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]，则[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基于类用于执行所有文本呈现。In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based class was used to perform all text rendering. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 计算字符间距和自动换行中的不同[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]. 使用 Windows 窗体应用程序中类来呈现文本，这可能会导致使用的控件的文本才会显示不同的应用程序中的其他文本。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解决此不兼容性，可以设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性设置为`true`特定控件。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`到`true`应用程序中的所有受支持控件，调用方法的参数替换`true`。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseMnemonic { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseMnemonic : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否将控件的 属性中的 & 符解释为访问键前缀字符。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control interprets an ampersand character (&) in the control's property to be an access key prefix character.

value.span: 如果标签不会显示 & 符字符并加上下划线后在其显示的文本和符号和带下划线的字符视为访问密钥;，否则为如果 & 号字符显示在控件的文本。

span.span: if the label doesn't display the ampersand character and underlines the character after the ampersand in its displayed text and treats the underlined character as an access key; otherwise, if the ampersand character is displayed in the text of the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`中定义助记键字符 （前面有 & 符的字符），属性的，按 ALT + 助记键字符将焦点设置到控件，遵循的 tab 键顺序。If the property is set to `true` and a mnemonic character (a character preceded by the ampersand) is defined in the property of the , pressing ALT+ the mnemonic character sets the focus to the control that follows the in the tab order. 此属性可用于提供正确的键盘导航到你的窗体上的控件。You can use this property to provide proper keyboard navigation to the controls on your form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件具有三维边框和显示使用的图像和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that has a three-dimensional border and an image displayed using the and properties. 使用指定的助记键字符，该控件还具有标题。The control also has a caption with a mnemonic character specified. 示例代码使用并属性，以正确的大小窗体上控制在其上显示。The example code uses the and properties to properly size the control on the form on which it is displayed. 此示例需要已创建并命名为 imageList1 和它所加载两个映像。This example requires that an has been created and named imageList1 and that it has loaded two images. 该示例还需要的代码是在窗体具有命名空间添加到其代码。The example also requires that the code is within a form that has the namespace added to its code. [!code-cpp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Label Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Label Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
